description: Returns information about configured OpenSearch Serverless security configurations. For more information, see SAML authentication for Amazon OpenSearch Serverless.

nested_items.name: securityConfigSummaries
nested_items.description: Details about the security configurations in your account.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the security configuration.

nested_items.name: configVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the security configuration.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the security configuration.

nested_items.name: createdDate
nested_items.description: The Epoch time when the security configuration was created.

nested_items.name: lastModifiedDate
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the configuration was last modified.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: When nextToken is returned, there are more results available. The value of nextToken is a unique pagination token for each page. Make the call again using the returned token to retrieve the next page.
